title: Input schema of the ESG Report Extractor scraper

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Seed URLs to start crawling from (company pages, investor relations pages, sustainability sections, directories).

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of requests the crawler will perform.

detectPdfLinks.title: Detect PDF links
detectPdfLinks.description: Detect and include links to PDF reports (true = include).

followInternalOnly.title: Follow internal links only
followInternalOnly.description: If true, only follow links within the same host as each start URL.
